benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: PUT /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/customFields - Modify custom fields to account

covered: Valid Request: The suite includes multiple scenarios that exercise successful PUT operations updating account custom fields with 204 responses.
Authorization: Tests cover authorized access and missing/invalid authentication (401).
Non-Existing Resource / Invalid IDs: Tests cover invalid accountId formats (TC06) and non-existent accounts (TC07) (400).
Concurrency: A dedicated concurrency scenario verifies data consistency under simultaneous updates (TC25).
Retry/Recovery: Tests model transient network errors with retry, succeeding and returning 204 when retried (TC22).
Edge cases: Handling of empty array (TC15), maximum field lengths (TC16), and extra properties ignored (TC17).
Header handling: Optional headers (TC02) accepted; unsupported headers are ignored (TC05).
Payload validation and error handling: Missing body (TC09), malformed JSON (TC10), invalid CustomField schema (TC11), and invalid data values (TC20/TC21).
Boundary and performance: Large payloads (TC04) and near-limit payload behavior (TC26).
Integration coverage: Audit logs (TC27) and external reporting synchronization (TC28).
Accessibility: Documentation and error messages accessibility (TC29).
Security: SQL injection (TC20) and XSS (TC21) defenses are exercised (400).
Backward compatibility: Previous API client compatibility (TC24).
gaps: Rate limiting/throttling scenarios are not covered.
Caching behavior (ETag/Cache-Control headers) is not tested.
500 Internal Server Error scenarios for generic server failures are not covered (only 503 and 502 tested).
403 Forbidden authorization scenarios are not explicitly covered.
recommendations: Add explicit 500 Internal Server Error tests for generic server or database failures.
Add rate-limiting tests to verify behavior under burst requests.
Add caching behavior tests for ETag and Cache-Control headers.
Expand authorization tests to include 403 Forbidden outcomes, not only 401 Unauthorized.
Introduce a more rigorous concurrency test with two simultaneous conflicting updates to verify last-writer-wins semantics.
Add tests for invalid Content-Type/Accept headers and explicit data-type validation within payload.
